body:
It seems due to https://github.com/LLNL/spack/commit/e76cfbbfd8707716a02f9849fbba962c20f0c37f#diff-5385006294b11a771037d296b7d79055 . If I comment the added lines out, it builds for me again.

Currently the error is:
```
configure: error: C compiler cannot create executables
```
title: m4 is failing to configure under Intel 17.0.2
